text: Kim Ok-suk (Hangul: 김옥숙, Hanja: 金玉淑) (born 8 September 1935) is the widow of South Korean President Roh Tae-woo. She was the first lady when Roh Tae-woo was in office, from 1988 to 1993. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of South Korea
title: Kim Ok-suk
